abstract: In what may gall some Wall Streeters, London will share the title of the most developed financial system with the Big Apple in a new study to be released by the World Economic Forum Tuesday, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: In what may gall some Wall Streeters, London will share the title of the most developed financial system with the Big Apple in a new study to be released by the World Economic Forum Tuesday, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: U.S. and Britain Share Top Spot on Financial Index

abstract: Don’t get distracted by the features Steve Jobs introduces Tuesday for the latest line of iPods. The window into how Apple thinks about its stand-alone music player business is whether it cuts its entry-level price points.
snippet: Don’t get distracted by the features Steve Jobs introduces Tuesday for the latest line of iPods. The window into how Apple thinks about its stand-alone music player business is whether it cuts its entry-level price points.
lead_paragraph: Expect a lot of socks at Apple’s event Tuesday. IPod Socks are the sort of brand building fluff that Apple talks about when it isn’t changing the fate of humanity.

abstract: Updates from Apple’s annual September music event, this year entitled “Let’s Rock.”
snippet: Updates from Apple’s annual September music event, this year entitled “Let’s Rock.”
lead_paragraph: We’re at the Yerba Buena Center for the Arts in San Francisco for Apple’s annual September music event, this year entitled “Let’s Rock.” The prodigious Apple rumor mill predicts new iPod Nanos, a cheaper iPod Touch and perhaps a new version of the iTunes software. Of course everyone’s eyes will be on Steven P. Jobs, whose appearance last June generated a round of speculation about his health. Stay tuned for updates; the most recent ones are on top.

headline.main: At Apple Event, a New iPod but No Big Surprises

abstract: Apple announced Tuesday at an event in San Francisco that a wide swath of NBC content would soon be available for sale, including “The Office,” “Heroes,” “Battlestar Galactica” and other popular series.
snippet: Apple announced Tuesday at an event in San Francisco that a wide swath of NBC content would soon be available for sale, including “The Office,” “Heroes,” “Battlestar Galactica” and other popular series.
lead_paragraph: For the past year, the long list of networks that sell TV shows through Apple’s iTunes store has been missing one big name: NBC Universal.

headline.main: NBC Shows Will Return to iTunes

abstract: Canonical, the corporate sponsor of the Ubuntu operating system, said its newest version, the Jaunty Jackalope, should boot faster and cater to Web-based applications.
snippet: Canonical, the corporate sponsor of the Ubuntu operating system, said its newest version, the Jaunty Jackalope, should boot faster and cater to Web-based applications.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft has spent years battling an Apple. Now it must go up against a Jaunty Jackalope as well.

headline.main: The Jaunty Jackalope Hops Aboard Ubuntu’s Ark

abstract: NBC Universal will bring its television shows back to Apple’s iTunes service after the computer maker loosened its pricing structure.
snippet: NBC Universal will bring its television shows back to Apple’s iTunes service after the computer maker loosened its pricing structure.
lead_paragraph: Apple likes to remake the world to its own aesthetic, but when parts of the world assert their natural ugliness, Apple will in fact back down. The latest example is the re-emergence of NBC shows on the iTunes store for download.

headline.main: Apple Offers Networks More Price Options for TV Shows

abstract: The iPhone may be Apple’s most talked-about product, but on Tuesday Apple focused attention on its most dominant franchise: the iPod and the iTunes music and video store.
snippet: The iPhone may be Apple’s most talked-about product, but on Tuesday Apple focused attention on its most dominant franchise: the iPod and the iTunes music and video store.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  The iPhone may be Apple’s most talked-about product, but on Tuesday Apple focused attention on its most dominant franchise: the iPod and the iTunes music and video store.

headline.main: Apple Turns Spotlight Back on iPod
headline.print_headline: Apple Shifts Spotlight to iPod and Revamps iTunes Software
